name: Top Posts This Month
author: Design of Tommie Hansen

sections.description: Simple WordPress Plugin that gives you the ability to add a widget where the most popular posts for the current month is displayed. You also have the option to name the widget and define number of posts to show. Read more about it at: http://byme.se/wp-plugins/top-posts-this-month.html
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder to YOUR-URL.com/wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the widgets panel and drag and drop the widget to your sidebar and configure it if you like
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Plugin released

The one that seek shall find. Say hello at http://byme.se or say something short and sweet at http://twitter.com/design_byme
